requests.name: status REQUEST_DENIED
requests.description: Denied request triggered by invalid API key.

requests.name: status INVALID_REQUEST
status REQUEST_DENIED
requests.description: Denied request triggered by invalid API key.

requests.name: status INVALID_REQUEST
requests.description: Invalid request triggered by invalid 'place_id' parameter.

requests.name: Place ID
requests.description: Verifies that the place can be located using place_id and saves lat,lng as environment variables for later usage.

requests.name: Results array
requests.description: Verifies that a JSON results array reutrns expected array elements along with address types and address component types.

requests.name: status ZERO_RESULTS
requests.description: The geocoder was passed a non-existent address.

requests.name: Viewport Biasing
requests.description: Verifies that the Geocoding service prefers results within a given viewport instead of those commonly returned when the bounds parameter has not been specified.

requests.name: status ZERO_RESULTS
requests.description: Zero results triggered by a latlng in a remote location.

requests.name: Latitude/Longitude restricted by type
requests.description: Uses lat,lng environment variables from previous test and restricts the addresses returned to those with a location type of ROOFTOP. Then it verifies that the location is matched to the one retrieved by using place_id in the previous test.

requests.name: Component Filtering
requests.description: Verifies that a query containing a component filter will only return the geocoding results that match the filter.
